output:

```{r read01, echo=FALSE}
suppressMessages(
  suppressWarnings(
    library(tidyverse)))
excerpt <- function(n) {
  n <- ifelse(n<10, paste0("0", n), as.character(n))
  '5510-xx-overview.md'                  %>%
    str_replace('xx', n)                 %>%
    read_lines                           %>%
    paste0(collapse='\n')                %>%
    str_split('####')                    %>%
    unlist                                -> sections
  paste0(
    '## Module', n, 
    ', ',
    sections[2],
    '### ',
    sections[4],
    '<div class="notes">',
    '\n\n',
    sections[3],
    '\n\n',
    '</div>')
}
full_text <- NULL
for (i in 1:4) {
  full_text <- paste(full_text, excerpt(i), sep="\n\n")
}
```
